page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN BODMIN
page.content: The {Walker Lines}Industrial Estate (Location 02080065) contains small manufacturing and distribution units employing a limited workforce. Some are not tenanted and others still under construction.{Products}include clocks,electrical components,polythene and paper products,hydraulic systems ,precision instruments ,lighting equipment,agricultural equipment, spectacle lenses and frames, furni- ture, plastic injection mouldings and building materials. Some firms{supply} rather than manufacture goods. Others{ {produce}and {distribute}foodstuffs including bakery products, frozen foods, ice-cream, fruit and vegetables. The site also houses a scrap-metal yard, a{Trading Standards {Office}and depots for Cornwall County Council and the Automobile Association.
